questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Accessibility and signage

B) A sports event
C) Accessibility signage
D) A family gathering

A) A tree
B) A person
C) A sign
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A wheelchair symbol
C) A car
D) A bench

A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What color is the outline of the symbol in the photo?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What does the symbol in the photo represent?

C) Reserved seating
D) Emergency exit

A) Grass
B) Wood
C) Concrete or asphalt
D) Metal

A) Circle
B) Triangle

D) Rectangle

A) Red
B) White
C) Blue
D) Yellow

What is the texture of the surface in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Soft

What is the significance of the yellow border in the photo?
A) To make the symbol more visible
B) To add decoration
C) To indicate a different zone
D) To show a warning

What might you expect to find near the symbol in a real-world setting?
A) Playground equipment
B) Vehicles
C) Office furniture
D) Household items

B) Prohibition

A) Animal
B) Human
C) Plant
D) Building

A) Red and green
B) Blue and yellow

B) Hazardous area

A) To beautify the area
